data.eml:eml: A new species of flea-toad, genus Brachycephalus Fitzinger (Amphibia: Anura: Brachycephalidae), from the Atlantic rainforest of southern Bahia, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Napoli, Marcelo Felgueiras, Caramaschi, Ulisses, Cruz, Carlos Alberto Gonçalves, Dias, Iuri Ribeiro (2011): A new species of flea-toad, genus Brachycephalus Fitzinger (Amphibia: Anura: Brachycephalidae), from the Atlantic rainforest of southern Bahia, Brazil. Zootaxa 2739: 33-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276578
